pages.text: “Juwaliji nkuti: ‘Ana mmwe chisimu chene n’di mwa akwitichisya?’
‘(Yanti) patuchiwapo ni kusyuka litaka ni maupa, nambo yakuona uwwe tuchilipidwa (pa itendo yetu)?”
(Nkuwecheta jula) tachiti: “Ana jenumanja chin’dingule (none ku Moto kuti mum’bone yajukuti pakulagasika?” Wanganyao tachiti: “Iyayi.”)
Basi jwalakwe ni juchilingula, basi ni tachim’bona (n’jakwejula) juli nkatikati mwa Moto Waukali
Juchiti: “Ngunnumbila Allah! Mmwetu mwasigele panandi kuti munyonanje (ngampikanile).”
“Soni ungawaga ukoto wa Ambuje wangu (Allah), ningaliji mwa akwika nao (ku Moto).”
(Wandu wa ku Mbepo tachiti): “Ana uwweji nikuti ngatuwa (soni)?”
“Ikaweje chiwa chetu chandandapechila, soni uwwe ngatulagasyidwa?”
Chisimu kwalakweku ni kupunda kwekulungwa nnope
Pa (kusaka kupata) yanti mpela ayi, basi apanganye masengo (gambone) akupanganya
Ana yalakweyi ni mbiko jambone, kapena chitela cha Zakkum
Chisimu Uwwe tuchitesile chele (chitelacho) kuwa mayeso ku walupuso (pakuwecheta wanganyao kuti: “Mpaka ikomboleche uli chitela kumela m’moto)?”
Chisimu chalakwecho ni chitela chachikopoka kuumila pasi pasyesyene pa Moto Waukali
Soso sya isogosi yakwe (siwele syakunyalaya nnope) mpela mitwe ja mashetani
Basi chisimu wanganyao takalyeje chele (chitelacho), ni chalakwecho takagumbasyeje ndumbo syao
Kaneko chisimu akwete kupata wanganyao kupwatika pa chele (chitelacho) chakuwanganyichisya gagali mesi gamasemule nnope
Kaneko chisimu kwakuwujila kwao ni ku Moto Waukali
Chisimu wanganyao wasimene achatati wao ali wapotele
Sano wanganyao mu sajo syao akutugala (pakwakuya mwachitemachitema mwangali kusosa kaje umboni)
Soni chisimu wapotele paujo pao wajinji (mu wandu) wandanda
Soni chisimu twatumisye mwa wanganyao akutetela
Basi nnole mujawelele mbesi ja akuteteledwa
Ikaweje achikapolo wa Allah wakuswejesyedwa
Soni chisimu Nuhu jwatuwilasile (kuti tun’jokole), basi ni Akwanga Wambone nnope (twaliji Uwwe)
Ni twan’jokwele jwalakwe ni wapewasa wakwe ku taabu jekulungwa
